// REAL TOURNAMENT NAMES FOR CONSISTENCY
export const REAL_TOURNAMENTS = [
  'Marvel Rivals Championship 2025',
  'Marvel Rivals World Series',
  'NA Regional Championship',
  'EU Regional Championship',
  'APAC Regional Championship',
  'Marvel Rivals Masters',
  'Marvel Rivals Open Series',
  'Last Chance Qualifier',
  'Marvel Rivals Invitational',
  'Season 1 Playoffs',
  'Marvel Rivals Major',
  'NA Last Chance Qualifier',
  'EU Regional Qualifier'
];

// HELPER FUNCTIONS FOR CONSISTENT DATA ACCESS
export const getTeamById = (id) => {
  return REAL_TEAMS.find(team => team.id === parseInt(id));
};

export const getTeamsByRegion = (region) => {
  if (region === 'all') return REAL_TEAMS;
  return REAL_TEAMS.filter(team => team.region === region);
};

export const getRandomTeams = (count = 2) => {
  const shuffled = [...REAL_TEAMS].sort(() => 0.5 - Math.random());
  return shuffled.slice(0, count);
};

export const getRandomTournament = () => {
  return REAL_TOURNAMENTS[Math.floor(Math.random() * REAL_TOURNAMENTS.length)];
};

// COUNTRY FLAG HELPER
export const getCountryFlag = (country) => {
  const flagMap = {
    'United States': 'ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸',
    'USA': 'ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸',
    'Canada': 'ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦',
    'Germany': 'ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª',

    'China': 'ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡³',
    'Saudi Arabia': 'ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡¦',
    'Australia': 'ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡º'
  };
  return flagMap[country] || 'ðŸŒ';
};

// REAL BACKEND PLAYER DATA CACHE - for quick lookup
export const REAL_PLAYERS_CACHE = {};

// Function to fetch and cache real players from backend
export const fetchRealPlayers = async (api) => {
  try {
    console.log('ðŸ”„ Fetching real players from backend API...');
    const response = await api.get('/players');
    const players = response?.data?.data || response?.data || [];
    
    if (Array.isArray(players) && players.length > 0) {
      // Cache players by team_id for quick team roster lookup
      players.forEach(player => {
        if (player.team_id) {
          if (!REAL_PLAYERS_CACHE[player.team_id]) {
            REAL_PLAYERS_CACHE[player.team_id] = [];
          }
          REAL_PLAYERS_CACHE[player.team_id].push({
            id: player.id,
            name: player.name || player.gamer_tag || `Player${player.id}`,
            role: player.role || 'Duelist',
            main_hero: player.main_hero || 'Iron Man',
            team_id: player.team_id,
            country: player.country || 'US'
          });
        }
      });
      console.log('âœ… Real players cached:', Object.keys(REAL_PLAYERS_CACHE).length, 'teams');
      return players;
    }
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('âŒ Failed to fetch real players:', error);
  }
  return [];
};

// Get real players for a team
export const getRealPlayersForTeam = (teamId) => {
  return REAL_PLAYERS_CACHE[teamId] || [];
};
